title: Beyaz Yalan
overview: They say people were couple created... Who Alara and Melek side by side saw, could have sworn the truth of this promise... These two young girls, they seemed to copy each other... The only thing that different was, was their destiny... Alara was born with a silver spoon in her mouth... she has everything you could imagine, except for the freedom... Melek had opened her eyes into poverty... She was beautiful, she was good hearted, she was hard-working, ambitious... Perhaps the only thing she needed, her unsmiling face's luck! "White Lie", the intersection of these two young girl's life ... the story of Alara's freedom, and Melek's story of a game that promises a chance to wait for life...
